| **Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbons (PAHs)** | Carcinogenic byproducts of incomplete combustion. | Linked to lung and bladder cancers. |
| **Arsenic, Cadmium, Lead** | Heavy metals released in fly ash and flue gas. | Neurotoxic, carcinogenic, and harmful to kidneys and the nervous system. |

### **B. Cardiovascular Disease**
